text: Pvris (pronounced "Paris" and stylized PVRIS) is an American pop rock band formed in Lowell, Massachusetts in 2012. Following several lineup changes, the band is now composed solely of frontwoman Lynn Gunn. ==Related pages== *Flyleaf *Halestorm *DHT *Lacuna Coil *Ylvis *Nico & Vinz Category:American rock bands
title: Pvris
